name: Circle Dog
description:
Use Mouse 1 to move the player (yellow dot "dog") around.

Use Mouse 2 to bark at wolves and or sheep.

Sheep will run away from you, try to get them to the "safe zone".

Safe Zone is the green patch with 4 wooden posts around it.

Wolves will try to go for a random sheep, you can bark at them to get them to flee from you for a short time.

Each time you win it gets progressively harder with more sheep and more wolves.

If you die by getting in the way of a wolf then you reset the game and difficulty.

If you don't save all the sheep then the level will reset with the same difficulty.
